trends: There has been one other sighting in La Plata
There were no other sightings in La Plata on or around November 2nd 2011
Summary: It landed somewhere far from my house in the woods
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my house(mother and father's) and i decided to go outside on my deck none of my family members were outside and the houses that i was between no one was outside and when i looked in the woods far from my house,all of a suden,i saw a litte or medium size dome in the woods it looked like it was metallic and i decided to go back into my house and i got my binoculars and looked at the woods and it was a UFO and right at the corner of my binoculars,i saw a human-like Alien,instead it had a big head like mine.And it seemed that those 3 aliens were smart because it looked like they cushion shoes on and also on their spacecraft's legs and the thing that they were doing(the aliens were grey)was they had a laser and was using it to cut something and that alien picked up what appeared to look like was a heart.i wanted to go over there to investigate to find the body but they took the body with them and the heart and the animal or human looked like it was already dead.When they were done they got back into their ship and lifted 50ft into the air and it looked like it was coming towards me,so i got back into my house but it passed me and i got outside again and i saw the object it was large and the sound was weird.When i saw it,the top(before it took off)it was grey,the whole ship was grey it's lights went on and they were red and it had windows and when i looked into them there wasn't just 3 aliens,there was 5 aliens.It was a disk but instead it looked like a deep dish pizza with a dome over it and another dome(it was small)and i looked into the top dome,an alien was flying the ship and looked at me and when i looked back at the landing point with the binos(binoculars)i saw nothing and the ship disintigrated with tiny bits and i think it had some kind of transporter.I was STUND this was my first UFO sighting i'm just glad i didn't get abducted.
